ygData.subject: Re: War
ygData.msgSnippet: (Code, again your facts are mistaking.  I never said you broke the rule.  I said you shouldn t have a gestalt because you couldn t RP with it correctly.

(Code, again your facts are mistaking.  I never said you broke the rule.  I 
said you shouldn't have a gestalt because you couldn't RP with it correctly.  
Hmmm...you blew off War Machine's ARM, that's because the arms are mine, 
isn't it, Yan?)



The Oblitercons/Sixshot/Unitron/Serpentor/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh 
Ripper/Ares/Minion:




Minion crashed to the ground in the shape of the left arm that had been blown 
off of War Machine, continuing with momentum on the ground for a cycle, then 
stopping.

---

Dark One barrell rolled, escaping autogun fire, letting two missiles loose 
downward at the Mafia Base.

---

Breakdown cursed, not seeing any body parts fly.  He obviously hadn't hit a 
target.  He fired off a grenade at Shokaract.

---

The three missiles explode, driving Pyro back several feet, leaving the front 
end of his tank mode dented and charred.  "FLAMES CAN'T HURT ME!" he 
screamed, firing off three fire balls at Shokaract.

---

Hiss fired off three fusion blasts at Shokaract.

---

Scavenger took out his missile launcher.  Surprisingly, he was the only 
Oblitercon WITH a missile launcher they could take out of subspace.  Raising 
his rifle, he fired off 25 explosive shells at the Mafia Base, followed by a 
rocket from his bazooka.

---

Demon Wulf fired off three optic blasts at the Mafia Base.

---

Flesh Ripper fired off a long burst of flames at the Mafia Base from his 
mouth.

---

"FALL!" Dark Claw yelled, throwing two orbs of energy, one from each palm, at 
the Mafia Base, each a little stronger than a grenade.

---

Sixshot dived, launching two missiles down at the Mafia Base.  "Your deaths 
shall be imminent."

---

Serpentor hissed, charging Shokaract, his energy blade in one hand, his 
plasma rifle in the other.  "Time to die!" he yelled as he fired off three 
bolts from his rifle at Shokaract's abdomen.

===

Ares slowly walked into the Alliance Base, heading for the CR chambers.  He 
stopped as he arrived, opening one and collapsing inside, the doors shutting 
and repairs starting to begin.
